extendedInfo.description: It's FREE! Try and Play full game !Play through 99 tracks and unlock secret powers in a theme park full of fun and surprises! Challenge yourself on the 4 courses of the Mini-Golf Masters â testing your power, speed, skill and smarts. Unlock their secret powers to send the ball past track obstacles like bumpers, spring jumps and teleporters. Get more holes, more objects and more fun with the most addictive Mini Golf game for mobile!Get 99 tracks in a theme park full of secret powers, crazy obstacles and characters!â¢ Play as one of 5 characters: Minny Golfer, El Macho Mustacho, Amber, Swift Stroker and Dr. von Putt - each with their own secret special power!â¢ Boost your play with up to 4 secret master powers: Jump, Brake Ball and more!â¢ Crazy track objects including big bumpers, teleporters and spring jumps to spice up the fun.â¢ Up to 5 theme park areas with expertly designed, unique tracks with spot-on game physics!â¢ Each theme park area has 3 difficulty levels: Easy, Medium and Hard. Master them all!â¢ Great controls - gently slide or tap your fingers on the touch screen to control the golf clubâ¢ Excellent music and sound effects

reviews.title: Fantastic
reviews.comment: Great free game. I can\'t get the magic ball to do anything. It just sits and spins I tap it but nothing happens please help. GS3
reviews.author: James Finley

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.comment: Poor thought out game considering the potential of it. Looked fun but disappointing.
reviews.author: Roy Bronze

reviews.title: Mini golf theme park
reviews.comment: Good golf game but as you line up shot then go to bar meter and tap to take shot. the line up moves and is unresponsive. needs a much better control bar then it would b a better game.
reviews.author: Martin Bentley

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: It used to be great. I can\'t choose previous levels to make them better& sometimes when I hit the power bar, it changes the direction of my ball. What is going on???!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Graphics could be better and more holes but good overall !!
reviews.author: Jake Hawkins

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It a cute app :)
reviews.author: takiya amiru

reviews.title: Off
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Can\'t play.
reviews.author: H Hansen

reviews.title: Resolution Problem!
reviews.comment: Screen size of game isn\'t match with screen size of device (Samsung Galaxy Y). It cannot play game. Please fix this problem. And this game should to can movable to SD card (APP2SD).
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mini golf:theme park. (By digital chocolate)
reviews.comment: Halted after a minute or so. Controls stopped working, could not play further. Seems to be incompatable with Cricket  ZTE SCORE.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SE Xperia PLAY 4G
reviews.comment: Latest version (4/13) does not support Landscape view. Works great with hardware buttons!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: As Fun As I Remember!
reviews.comment: I had several Digital Chocolate games on my 1st contract phone, an old Moto Razr, and missed them. This brings back fond memories of wasted hours! TY, DC! :-D
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Inferior to iOS Version
reviews.comment: Why couldn\'t they give us the same version that is on iOS? The music, graphics, gameplay, controls, etc. are much worse. If this was the same version I would give it 4 or 5 stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: This game is rubbish I tried to hit a ball and it jus froze everything else was moving except the ball There is no aim to the game and it is really hard to play it may just be me but honestly it was a waste of time installing it  DO NOT INSTALL THIS APP It sucks  Sorry but this is a one star game   Rubbish
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Only 3 stars
reviews.comment: Cause the swing meter gets in the way of the holes on some of lanes. Can\'t see how to line up for a shot. Fix that and then it\'ll be a 5
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Buttons in awkward place.
reviews.comment: The game looks OK but can be annoying when having to keep pressing continue in bottom corners. The buttons need to be away from the corners a bit. Would like swell to be able to continue by tapping anywhere on the screen. Would prefer hold and release on the power bar too.
reviews.author: Michael B

reviews.title: Huh?
reviews.comment: Update has caused screen to enlarge to point that its not playable.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Mini golf
reviews.comment: Fun game but power button in the way on most shot, hard time aiming ball,not enough time to shoot on the speed round
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too much in the way of the game
reviews.comment: Loading screen after loading screen. Cant see properly in the game cos the power meter blocks the view
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Paige
reviews.comment: Worst game ever and leval 34 is really hard
reviews.author: A Google User
